channel.title: How to make it when a player logs in it yells -playername- has logged in
channel.description: i want to make it so when a certain player logs in it yells -playername- had logged in. how do i do that?

item.title: How to make it when a player logs in it yells -playername- has logged in
item.dc:creator: @samskswanch samskswanch
item.description:
@samskswanch wrote:

[quote=“i noob iii, post:9, topic:316632”][quote author=samskswanch link=topic=413170.msg3043750#msg3043750 date=1259322856]
ok but when i search for that code nothing comes up wat do i do
[/quote]

try looking for just this:

if (getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]) < 11)

what’s your server based off?[/quote]
nature scape

Read full topic

item.title: How to make it when a player logs in it yells -playername- has logged in
item.dc:creator: @i_noob_iii i noob iii
item.description:
@i_noob_iii wrote:

i think the colors for that are client sided.

try finding this instead:

            if (readSave() != 3 && checkbannedusers() != 5
                    && checkbannedips() != 5) {

more then one name you could do this

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“NAMEHERE”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“NAMEHERE”))
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ " has logged in";
}

Read full topic

item.title: How to make it when a player logs in it yells -playername- has logged in
item.dc:creator: @clarkyrulz clarkyrulz
item.description:
@clarkyrulz wrote:

[quote=“i noob iii, post:2, topic:316632”]client.java look for:

if(getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]) < 11) {
playerXP[3] = 1155;
}
NewHP = playerLevel[3];

under that add :

if (playerRights >= 0)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ " has logged in";
}

that would make it say “playername” has logged in whenever some one logs in,
if u want it just for one person you could do this;

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("NAMEHERE")) 
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll =  playerName+ " has logged in";
}

goodluck ;)[/quote]

How do u make it so the text is in yellow or red?

so its says “(playername) has logged in” i want that to be in a different colour than black

Read full topic
item.source: How to make it when a player logs in it yells -playername- has logged in

item.title: How to make it when a player logs in it yells -playername- has logged in
item.dc:creator: @i_noob_iii i noob iii
item.description:
@i_noob_iii wrote:

client.java look for:

if(getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]) < 11) {
playerXP[3] = 1155;
}
NewHP = playerLevel[3];

under that add :

if (playerRights >= 0)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ " has logged in";
}

that would make it say “playername” has logged in whenever some one logs in,
if u want it just for one person you could do this;

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("NAMEHERE")) 
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll =  playerName+ " has logged in";
}

goodluck

Read full topic
